page.title: 10Social Groups in Wistow
page.content: The Wistow Womens' Institute has l9 members and meets monthly in the Village Hall. Members hear speakers on a variety of subjects and take part in county and nationally organised events. The Church Club is called the Seekers and is for the age range of 5 - l2 years. Monthly club nights are held where table tennis is played and members meet each Sunday after morning service for Bible study. There are l4 members. The pensioners are catered for by a Darby and Joan Club and members are over 65. There are l4 members who meet monthly in the Village Hall ten times a year, either in the afternoon or evening. An occasional outing is also arranged. A small playschool caters for the pre- school children.
